about_the_game:
Earth's resources are nearly depleted, its governments bankrupt. Mankind's last hope for survival lies in the deep pockets of greedy Megacorporations and their self-regulated "asteroid trade".

Pit your skills against other pilots as you fight, harvest, and haul. Fly alongside allies and crush competing corps into insolvency in the ultimate test of fast-action ship-based first-person shooters. Do you have the right ship and piloting skills to survive and take home the spoils of battle? Find out in STFU!

KEY FEATURES:


MAKE YOUR SHIP YOUR OWN
Level up your ships to advanced through their unique tech trees. Install unique cosmetics including paint jobs, trails, and decals. Equip performance mods affecting the ship's weapons, hulls, and more.




FLY WHAT YOU WANT
Fight in tight, twisting caverns while you move, hide, and attack in every direction using ships across 5 different classes. From attack ships to light up your enemies, miners and haulers to take home the loot, and defenders to protect your squad, STFU has just the ship for you, your mission, and your playstyle.




HARVEST AND CRAFT
Mine the resources you need to craft mods and optimize your ship. Assault enemy faction bases and asteroids to steal their resources and play against other players to win the rarest of materials. Every game you play gives you something to discover and build with for the next!




EXPERIENCE MULTIPLE PLAY FORMATS
Beyond solo-play missions and free-for-all PvP modes, STFU tests players’ abilities to work together and communicate quickly in the heat of battle with Co-Op PvE missions and 6v6 team battle modes.




BUY, SELL, AND TRADE UGC
Customize, optimize, and trade your creations and User Generated Content (UGC) with the STFU community! Our gaming platform allows content creators and collectors to trade their items with players and fans, if they choose.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Kernel 2.6.32 or newer, glibc 2.12.2 or newer
  • Processor: 64-Bit
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 550 Ti or better, AMD 7950 or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requirements subject to change as development progresses. VR may have higher recommended requirements, per manufacturer.

  • OS: Kernel 2.6.32 or newer, glibc 2.12.2 or newer
  • Processor: 64-Bit, Quad-Core, 2.5GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD 270 or better, NVIDIA 750 or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 75 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requirements subject to change as development progresses. VR may have higher recommended requirements, per manufacturer.

short_description: Experience a 6-degrees-of-freedom ship shooter across pulse pounding single player, co-op, and PvP gameplay. Choose your class and ship then customize and upgrade with unique cosmetics, powerful mods, and class-based tech trees. Level up and light em' up!
